successes.title: Bia: Multi-Sport GPS Sports Watch with SOS Safety Alert
successes.description: Bia is the first multi-sport watch you'll love! Slim lightweight design. No-wait GPS. Plus a must-have safety alert for solo workouts.

Pledges.description: CHEER US ON! Every little bit counts and every Bia backer makes us stronger. You get a big thank you on our website and regular updates as we field test and move through production. Plus you'll feel great.

JOIN THE TEAM!
In addition to a thank-you and progress updates, you'll get a free band if you order a Bia sports watch when we ship this spring.
SPREAD THE WORD. We send you a super cute Bia tech running shirt now and a free band if you order a Bia sports watch when we ship this spring. ..and of course, the thank-you and progress updates.
GET THE WATCH. Get one black/silver Bia sports watch with your choice of solid colored band. This will retail for $129. (Bia GPS Go Stick not included in this reward.)

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL. Kick it up with some color! Just like the $99 award EXCEPT you can choose any color watch with matching solid band (turquoise, firefly or pink) plus a 2nd band of your choice, solid or print.

NEW! ADD A SHIRT. This is the $129 backer reward plus a Bia tech shirt in your choice of color. Sport some Bia pride while we are hard at work getting ready to rock your wrist with a Bia. Shirts ship in July.

FULL MULTI-SPORT BAD@SS. Add GPS! Get one black/silver Bia sports watch, any solid band AND a Bia GPS Go Stick. This will retail for at *least* $249. The equivalent multi-sport device from Garmin costs $349.

FOR THE GUYS. Don't be the dork "locating satellites" while the women leave you in the dust. Your black/silver Bia sports watch comes with a Bia GPS Go Stick and an extra long black band for male wrists. The equivalent multi-sport device from Garmin costs $349. You know you want it!

NEW! ADD A SHIRT. This is the $199 backer reward plus a Bia tech shirt in your choice of color. Sport some Bia pride while we are hard at work getting ready to rock your wrist with a Bia. Shirts ship in July.

NEW! ADD A GUYS SHIRT: This is the $209 backer reward plus a limited edition men's version of the Bia tech shirt. It will be the same great fabric but in black with a rounded neck and the Bia logo on the back like the women's shirt - but without the flower design on the front. Shirts ship in July.

SPORT YOUR STYLE. Kick it up with some color! Just like the $199 award EXCEPT you can choose any color watch with matching solid band (turquoise, firefly or pink) plus a 2nd band of your choice, solid or print - and the GPS Go Stick of course.

NEW! ADD A SHIRT. This is the $249 backer reward plus a Bia tech shirt in your choice of color. Sport some Bia pride while we are hard at work getting ready to rock your wrist with a Bia. Shirts ship in July.
BEST. GIFT. EVER. Make her the envy of all her friends this holiday.
Just like the $249 award PLUS a 3rd band, engraving, a peace of mind subscription and a Bia tech shirt.
In early December, we'll send the shirt with a card announcing your gift. The rest arrives in April.

HIS & HERS: Our first backer-requested reward! Two Bia sports watches, each with it's own GPS Go Stick. One is black/silver with an extra long band for him. The other is in your choice of color with a coordinating solid band for her.

NEW! ADD A SHIRT. This is the $419 backer reward plus a Bia tech shirt in your choice of color. Sport some Bia pride while we are hard at work getting ready to rock your wrist with a Bia. Shirts ship in July.

NEW! ADD HIS & HER SHIRTS. This is the $419 backer reward plus Bia tech shirts for two. Women's comes in choice of colors. Men's will be black with the Bia logo on back (but no flowers design in the front.) Sport some Bia pride while we are hard at work getting ready to rock your wrist with a Bia. Shirts ship in July.

KICK-BUTT. Betty Designs works with you to design your own custom watch band! We include five of your custom bands along with any color Bia sports watch and a Bia GPS Go Stick engraved with your name or motivational mantra.

BE FIRST. Help us field test Bia this summer. You get a Bia tech shirt and one of the first pre-production Bia units. As part of our testing team your feedback impacts the final product and future development.

Then we'll replace your test unit with a brand new Bia sports watch in any color, two bands, and a Bia GPS Go Stick engraved with your name or motivational mantra. PLUS we'll give you a second set of everything to gift to a friend!

RUN WITH IT! Every awesome part of the $279 reward: the shirt! the Bia sport watch in any color! the Bia GPS Go Stick! watch bands galore! plus monogramming on your new Bia GPS Go Stick. And Cheryl or Sylvia will be your running buddy for a race somewhere in the US!

ALL IN: Combine everything from the $600 and the $1000 backer rewards. You'll be one of the first Bia field testers and you'll have your own custom watch band. Plus either Sylvia or Cheryl will come run a race with you. (please nothing too painful and the race should be in the US.)

RESELLER PACK + LADIES NIGHT: 15 Bia watches each with a GPS Go Stick. Any color with coordinating solid color band. Plus if you are in the US, Cheryl or Sylvia will visit for an in-store demo and ladies night.

FOR A CAUSE: Pay it forward while giving back. Get 20 watch/GPS Go Stick bundles in any color all with a custom designed band representing your cause. Bia will sell them as a limited edition design and donate all the proceeds to the charity of your choice.

ALMOST FAMOUS. Send us your ideas and we design a custom watch face that ships as part of every Bia sports watch. This reward also includes any color sports watch, two bands, an engraved Bia GPS Go Stick, and a tech shirt. PLUS we'll give you a second set of everything to gift to a friend!
